articles.title: Canary Islands: 48 arrested in international cocaine gang bust - BBC
articles.description: Police say smugglers used a network of speedboats to ferry drugs from South America to the Spanish islands.
articles.content:
A major cocaine smuggling operation that used a network of speedboats to transport drugs from South America to the Canary Islands has been taken down, police have said.
Almost four tonnes of cocaine… [+2420 chars]

articles.author: Chris Isidore
articles.title: Car prices hold steady in May despite tariffs - CNN
articles.description: Even with new tariffs on imported cars and car parts, American car buyers paid slightly less in May for new vehicles.
articles.content:
Even with new tariffs on imported cars and car parts, American car buyers paid slightly less in May for new vehicles.
